title: how can i reinstall the alpha client?
body: i some how deleted the alpha client and no matter how many times uninstall LoL and reinstall it it says "please install alpha client and try again"  please help...

replies.body:
i fixed it
 1. right-click  league on desktop and open file location 

2. find and delete leagueclient.exe (aka the alpha) 

3. then start league  an update should show up and re-download  leagueclient.exe that should work ~hint~ It might not say .exe  if you're running windows 10 look for the alpha client icon

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

so yeah good luck and tell rito _**FIX THIS SHIT**_  ~~you lazy pigs~~{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} [http://imgur.com/eJZJ2Un ]
didn't find the leagueclient.exe file

I know this might be a little late, but look for a file called LeageClient, or something similar. Delete it and re open league to re start the logging in process/re start the launch. 
Hope it helps, It worked for me :D

Thanks ;)

I had the same problem. the fix is pretty easy.
uninstall your game
go to the install folder and realize that uninstalling doesnt remove much of anything
manually delete that folder
re-install the legacy client
upgrade to alpha client on the landing screen
there might be an easier way somewhere, but thats just how I did it
Rito plz i cant play League bcs it just says: Please Re-install League alpha client and try again   :( RIOT PLZ FIX

*Solairrow* is correct, this issue is typically caused by an *improper reinstallation* of League. You can follow their directions or the ones listed in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) and you should be good to go!

Let me know if you have any questions.
